sql.sql: select t.* from fz_xzqzzxxysqb t where t.xzqzzxxysqbuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from FZ_QZZXZZSQB t where t.qzzxzzsqbuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t. XZFYGYXXBUUID, t. XZFYSQDJBUUID, t. SQSXMC, t. SQR, t. SQRQ, t. FYSQCHRQ, t. SQCHYY, t. DJR_DM, t. DJRQ, t. JTXZXWMC, t. JTXZXWZCRQ, t. WSZG, t. SQLY, t. TZJTXZXWYY_DM, t. YQSFHL, t. SFDCHJXY, t. DCHJXYRQ, t. HJXYZYNR, t. TCHFXRQ, t. GFXWJWSZG, t. GFXWJMC, t. TQCLLY, t. FYYJHJYLXMC, t. SDJGBM, t. SDJGBMDZ, t. ZSRQ_3, t. ZSR_DM, t. ZSTYBZ, t. SDR_DM, t. WSSDRQ, t. SFFH_1, t. FHLY, t. DJR, t. SFFK, t. CLJG, t. CLR_DM, t. CLRQ, t. FKRQ, t. DZBZDSZL_DM, t. LCSWSX_DM, t. LCSLID, t. HDSLID, t. SJSLID, t. ZFRQ_1, t. ZFR_DM, t. ZFBZ_1, t. LRRQ, t. LRR_DM, t. XGRQ, t. XGR_DM, t. SJGSDQ, t. GFXWJCLLY_DM, t. SFYSQ, t. FLYJ, t.sqsx from FZ_XZFYGYXXB t where t.XZFYSQDJBUUID = $uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm in('BDA1220017','BDA1220018') and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.tzsuuid, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.byslly, t.sqsx, t.slswjg_dm, t.fyjgmc, t.slswjgmc, t.slr_dm, t.wszzrq, t.slrq, t.blqx, t.sqrq, t.slbz, t.swryxm, t.fyjgmc, t.fyjg_dm, t.wszg, t.lcswsx_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.bznr from fz_swsxtzs t, gy_ws_wszb a where t.slbz = 'B' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and t.tzsuuid = a.ywwsuuid and a.wszzgz_dm like '%1'

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_JJGFJFPGJCYTTZS T WHERE (1 = $tj1$ OR T.JJGFJFPGJCYTTZSUUID = $value1$) AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.SJSLID = $value2$) AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $value3$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.*,c.wfxwbh ajbh,c.wfxwmc ajmc from fz_xzqzzxxysqb t,fz_sswfxwdj c where t.qzzxdjbuuid = $uuid$ and t.qzzxdjbuuid = c.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.nsdbccqdzbuuid,t.dbccmc as dbccqtdcmc,t.dbccgg as dbccqtdcgg,t.dbccqs as dbccqtdcqs,t.dbccjldw as dbccqtdcdw, t.dbccsl as dbccqtdcsl,t.dbccdj as dbccqtdcdj ,t.dbccje as dbccqtdcje from fz_nsdbccqd_zb t where t.bdcbz='Q' and t.nsdbccqduuid=?
select t.* from CS_FZ_LCCZYPZB t where t.swjg_dm = $value1$

SELECT T.*, B.SSBQSQSJ FROM FZ_SSBQYQXXB T LEFT JOIN (SELECT SQ.SQRQ SSBQSQSJ, BQ.SSBQXXBUUID FROM FZ_SWXZZFSQB SQ, FZ_SSBQXXB BQ WHERE SQ.AJXXUUID = BQ.AJXXUUID AND SQ.LCSLID = BQ.LCSLID AND NVL(SQ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(BQ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N') B ON T.SSBQXXBUUID = B.SSBQXXBUUID WHERE T.AJXXUUID = $value2$ AND (1 = $tj4$ OR T.YXBZ = $value4$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_ZLXQJNSFK T WHERE T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $value2$ AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value3$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.sjswjg_dm, d.swjgbz, d.jgjc_dm, d.swjgjg, level from dm_gy_swjg d where level <= ? start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm and d.xybz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM FZ_CBSKHFKBG T WHERE T.FYSSFCAJBH = $cbskhfkbguuid$ AND nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_KJSSKXTZS T WHERE T.KJSSKXTZSUUID = $value1$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.*, c.wfxwbh ajbh, c.wfxwmc ajmc from fz_qzzxdj_qsqj a, fz_qzzxzzsqb t, fz_sswfxwdj c where a.djxh = $uuid$ and a.qzzxzzsqbuuid = t.qzzxzzsqbuuid and a.zzbz = 'Y' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.qzzxdjbuuid = c.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select d.swjg_dm, d.swjgmc, d.sjswjg_dm, d.swjgbz, d.jgjc_dm, d.swjgjg, level from dm_gy_swjg d where level <= ? start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.swjg_dm = d.sjswjg_dm and d.xybz = 'Y' and d.yxbz = 'Y'

select d.wfxwbh, d.sswfxwdjuuid, d.djjg_dm, d.djxh from fz_sswfxwdj d where d.djjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and d.wfxwbh = ? and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from fz_swxzpc t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.sjslid = $uuid$ order by t.lrrq asc

SELECT T.*, SUBSTR(T.SSWFSD_DM, 0, 2) SSWFLX_DM FROM CS_FZ_XZCFCLQ T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SWJG_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WFCD_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.SSWFSD_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.WFXWZTXZ = ?)

select t.pmbmgyxxbuuid, t.djxh, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.ajxxuuid, t.yuuid, t.pmbmswjg_dm, t.swjgjg, t.sjslid, t.zg, t.nh, t.wh, t.flyj, t.jdnr, t.sjslid, t.lcslid, t.fyjg_dm, t.fyjgmc, t.spswjg_dm, t.wszzrq, t.wszg from fz_pmbmgyxxb t where t.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA1220136' and (1 = $tj1$ or t.ajxxuuid = $uuid$) and (1 = $tj2$ OR t.lcslid = $ywzjuuid$)
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZZXTZS T WHERE T.JDSUUID = $value3$ AND (1 = $tj4$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value4$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SWCLJDQKB T WHERE T.SWCLJDSUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT A.* FROM FZ_ZLXQGZ_CBMX A WHERE A.ZLXQGZXXBUUID IN (#macroparam#)

select t.xzfysqdjbuuid, t.ajbh_1, t.ajmc, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.sqr, t.xzfyjg_dm, t.FYSQDYJTXZXWMC, t.sqrq, t.tszt,t.djxh from fz_xzfysqdjb t where t.FYAJZT in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.ajbh_1 = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.ajmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.nsrmc like ?) and t.xzfyjg_dm =? and (T.ZFBZ_1 = ? OR T.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL) and (T.tszt = ? OR T.tszt = ? OR T.tszt IS NULL)
select t.* from jc_cbyjsyqkb t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$
select tzs.jcajxxuuid, tzs.slwyhcydw, tzs.slrq, tzs.sldw, tzs.wszzswjg_dm from fz_zdswajsmsltzs tzs where tzs.jcajxxuuid = ? and (tzs.zfbz_1 = ? or tzs.zfbz_1 is null)
select t.* from fz_swxzpc t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ order by t.lrrq asc
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_PMBMGYXXB T WHERE T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value1$ AND T.LCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
select t.* from fz_swsxtzs t, gy_ws_wszb a where t.slbz = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and t.tzsuuid = a.ywwsuuid and a.wszzgz_dm like '%1'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZFYTZBL T WHERE T.SJSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$
select t.*,c.wfxwbh ajbh,c.wfxwmc ajmc from fz_xzqzzxxysqb t,fz_sswfxwdj c where c.wfxwbh = $uuid$ and t.qzzxdjbuuid = c.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T.*, D.WFXWBH AJBH, D.WFXWMC AJMC, D.DJXH, D.NSRSBH, D.NSRMC FROM FZ_QZZXDJB T, FZ_SSWFXWDJ D WHERE D.SSWFXWDJUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND NVL(D.JCAJBZ, 'N') = $value1$ AND T.QZZXDJBUUID = $value2$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $value3$ AND T.ZLCSLID IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT T.*, C.JCAJBH AJBH, C.AJMC AJMC, C.DJXH, C.NSRSBH, C.NSRMC FROM FZ_QZZXDJB T, JC_AJXX C WHERE T.QZZXDJBUUID = $value4$ AND C.JCAJXXUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $value5$ AND T.ZLCSLID IS NOT NULL

select t.* from fz_xzqzzxxy_fqmx t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = $tj1$ OR T.Xzqzzxxyfqmxuuid = $value1$) and (1 = $tj2$ OR T.xzqzzxxyszmxuuid = $value2$) and (1 = $tj3$ OR T.Xzqzzxxysqbuuid = $value3$)

select j.* from fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_swxzcfjds_jy j where d.sswfxwdjuuid = j.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and d.sswfsd_dm = '050201' and nvl(d.jcajbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.rgdjbz, 'N') = 'N' and d.djxh = $djxh$ and (1 = $tj1$ OR j.wszzrq >= to_date($value1$, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = $tj2$ OR j.wszzrq < to_date($value2$, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = $tj3$ OR j.sfjscf = $value3$)

SELECT T.*, D.WFXWBH AJBH, D.WFXWMC AJMC, D.DJXH, D.NSRSBH, D.NSRMC FROM FZ_QZZXDJB T, FZ_SSWFXWDJ D WHERE D.SSWFXWDJUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND NVL(D.JCAJBZ, 'N') = $value1$ AND D.WFXWBH = $value2$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $value3$ AND T.ZLCSLID IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT T.*, C.JCAJBH AJBH, C.AJMC AJMC, C.DJXH, C.NSRSBH, C.NSRMC FROM FZ_QZZXDJB T, JC_AJXX C WHERE C.JCAJBH = $value4$ AND C.JCAJXXUUID = T.AJXXUUID AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $value5$ AND T.ZLCSLID IS NOT NULL

with cc as (SELECT S.DZBZDSZL_DM, S.WSSDSJ, S.SDZT_DM, S.DJXH, S.NSRSBH, S.NSRMC, T.*, T.SWJGJG || T.ZG || '〔' || T.NH || '〕' || T.WH || '号' AS WSZG FROM ZH_SDXX S, FZ_SWXZCFJDS_JY T WHERE NVL(S.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND S.SDZT_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR S.DJXH = ?) AND S.SDWSUUID = T.SWXZCFJDSJYUUID AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND T.CFSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WSZZRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.WSZZRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1) ), BL AS (select * from fz_cssbbl WHERE zfbz_1 = ? ) select cc.*, bl.dsrxm, BL.cssbqklx_Dm, BL.cssbnr from cc left join BL on cc.cssbbluuid = BL.cssbbluuid

select distinct a.xzqzzxxysqbuuid, d.wfxwbh ajbh, d.wfxwmc ajmc, d.djjg_dm, e.lrr_dm from Fz_Xzqzzxxy_Fqmx a, Fz_Xzqzzxxysqb b, fz_qzzxdj_qsqj c, fz_sswfxwdj d, FZ_QZZXZZSQB e where a.xjqx <= sysdate and c.zzbz = 'Y' and a.xzqzzxxysqbuuid = b.xzqzzxxysqbuuid and b.qzzxdjbuuid = c.qzzxdjbuuid and c.ajxxuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and c.qzzxdjbuuid = e.qzzxdjbuuid union all select distinct a.xzqzzxxysqbuuid, d.wfxwbh ajbh, d.wfxwmc ajmc, d.djjg_dm, e.lrr_dm from Fz_Xzqzzxxy_Fqmx a, Fz_Xzqzzxxysqb b, fz_qzzxdjb c, fz_sswfxwdj d, FZ_QZZXZZSQB e where a.xjqx <= sysdate and c.zzbz = 'Y' and a.xzqzzxxysqbuuid = b.xzqzzxxysqbuuid and b.qzzxdjbuuid = c.qzzxdjbuuid and c.ajxxuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and c.qzzxdjbuuid = e.qzzxdjbuuid
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFJDS T WHERE T.CBSKHFKBGUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_ZLXQJNSFK T WHERE T.SJSLID = $value5$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select a.* from fz_sswfajjczzzxsqb a where a.sswfajjczzzxsqbbuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_TZBG T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $uuid$
SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.SSAJBH ORDER BY A.SSCS DESC) RN FROM FZ_SWXZYSAJDJB A WHERE A.DJXH = $uuid$ ) B WHERE B.RN = 1

select d.*, j.yzpzxh, j.cfswjg_dm, j.fk_1 from fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_swxzcfjds_jy j where d.sswfxwdjuuid = j.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(j.yzpzxh, 0) != 0 and d.sswfxwclzt_dm != '38' and d.sswfsd_dm = '050201' and nvl(d.jcajbz, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.rgdjbz, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SSWFXWXZCFSCBGFB T WHERE T.SWXZCFJDSUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select * from fz_qzzxdj_qsqj_fb T WHERE (1 = $tj1$ OR T.QZZXDJBUUID = $uuid$)

SELECT D.DJXH, Z.ZLXQGZXXBUUID, Z.SSWFXWDJUUID, Z.SWJGJG || Z.ZG || '〔' || Z.NH || '〕' || Z.WH || '号' AS ZLXQGZWSZG, Z.WFXWLX, Z.FLYJ, Z.ZLXQGZQX, Z.ZLXQGZNR, Z.FYJG_DM, Z.FYJGMC, Z.WSZZRQ, Z.XGSWJG_DM, Z.SFGZ, Z.XHRQ, Z.ZLXQGZZT_DM, Z.YWFL_DM, Z.LCSLID, Z.HDSLID, Z.SJSLID, Z.SJGSDQ, J.SWXZCFJDSUUID, J.CBSKHFKBGUUID, J.SWJGJG || J.ZG || '〔' || J.NH || '〕' || J.WH || '号' AS CFJDSWSZG, J.JCRQQ, J.JCRQZ, J.JCSSQQ, J.JCSSQZ, J.JCFWHNR, J.WFSS, J.WFSD, J.CFJD, J.SWXZCFYJ, J.YJFKJE, J.JKQX, J.JKDD, J.JKZH, J.FYJG_DM AS CFJDSFYJG_DM, J.FYJGMC AS CFJDSFYJGMC, J.WSZZRQ AS CFJDSZZRQ, J.SWJG_DM, J.ZZSWJG_DM, J.FKXJTS FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ D, FZ_ZLXQGZXXB Z LEFT JOIN FZ_SWXZCFJDS J ON Z.SSWFXWDJUUID = J.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(J.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' WHERE NVL(D.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND D.SSWFXWDJUUID = Z.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(Z.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND Z.SWJGJG || Z.ZG || '〔' || Z.NH || '〕' || Z.WH || '号' = $value1$ UNION ALL SELECT D.DJXH, '' AS ZLXQGZXXBUUID, J.SSWFXWDJUUID AS SSWFXWDJUUID, '' AS ZLXQGZWSZG, NULL AS WFXWLX, NULL AS FLYJ, NULL AS ZLXQGZQX, NULL AS ZLXQGZNR, '' AS FYJG_DM, '' AS FYJGMC, NULL AS WSZZRQ, '' AS XGSWJG_DM, '' AS SFGZ, NULL AS XHRQ, '' AS ZLXQGZZT_DM, '' AS YWFL_DM, '' AS LCSLID, '' AS HDSLID, '' AS SJSLID, '' AS SJGSDQ, J.SWXZCFJDSUUID, J.CBSKHFKBGUUID, J.SWJGJG || J.ZG || '〔' || J.NH || '〕' || J.WH || '号' AS CFJDSWSZG, J.JCRQQ, J.JCRQZ, J.JCSSQQ, J.JCSSQZ, J.JCFWHNR, J.WFSS, J.WFSD, J.CFJD, J.SWXZCFYJ, J.YJFKJE, J.JKQX, J.JKDD, J.JKZH, J.FYJG_DM AS CFJDSFYJG_DM, J.FYJGMC AS CFJDSFYJGMC, J.WSZZRQ AS CFJDSZZRQ, J.SWJG_DM, J.ZZSWJG_DM, J.FKXJTS FROM FZ_SSWFXWDJ D, FZ_SWXZCFJDS J WHERE NVL(D.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND D.SSWFXWDJUUID = J.SSWFXWDJUUID AND NVL(J.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND J.SWJGJG || J.ZG || '〔' || J.NH || '〕' || J.WH || '号' = $value2$
UPDATE JC_SWCLJDQKB T SET T.SWCLJDSUUID = '', T.SJSLID = '', T.XGRQ = SYSDATE WHERE T.SWCLJDQKBUUID = ?
select t.* from FZ_SWXZBCXXB t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ order by t.lrrq asc
select * from fz_qzzxdj_qsqj T WHERE (1 = $tj1$ OR T.QZZXDJBUUID = $uuid$) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_NSDBJCCL T WHERE T.SJSLID = $value2$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM CS_FZ_XQTSPZB T WHERE T.SWJG_DM = $value1$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value2$
select t.* from FZ_SSWFAJZZZXSQB t where t.sswfajzzzxsqbuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from fz_swsxtzs t, gy_ws_wszb a where t.slbz = 'N' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and t.tzsuuid = a.ywwsuuid and a.wszzgz_dm like '%2'
select z.* from fz_zlxqgzxxb z, fz_sswfxwdj d where z.sswfxwdjuuid = d.sswfxwdjuuid and d.djxh = $value1$ and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and d.sswfsd_dm = $value2$

select z.*, d.djxh, s.sdzt_dm, h.wssdfs_dm, h.sdhzuuid from zh_sdxx s, zh_sdhz h, fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_zlxqgzxxb z where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdzt_dm = '03' and s.sdhzuuid = h.sdhzuuid and s.sdwsuuid = z.zlxqgzxxbuuid and nvl(h.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and h.wssdfs_dm = '5' and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.rgdjbz, 'N') = 'N' and d.sswfsd_dm = '050201' and d.sswfxwdjuuid = z.sswfxwdjuuid and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.ywfl_dm = 'A06' and z.zlxqgzzt_dm = '3' and z.zlxqgzqx < sysdate + 1 and nvl(z.sfyzdfqdcxc, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_QZZXDJB A, FZ_QZZXZZSQB T WHERE A.QZZXZZSQBUUID = T.QZZXZZSQBUUID AND A.ZZBZ = $value1$ AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $value2$ AND T.DJXH = $value3$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $value4$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK T WHERE T.SWXZCFJDSUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_BKCKGL T WHERE T.DJXH = $value2$ AND (1 = $tj3$ OR T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value3$) AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from fz_xzqzzxxy t where t.xzqzzxxyuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_TZBL T WHERE T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND T.SSWFXWDJUUID = $uuid$
SELECT T.*, SUBSTR(T.SSWFSD_DM, 0, 2) SSWFLX_DM FROM CS_FZ_SWBFPZB T WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR T.SWJG_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.SSWFSD_DM = ?)
select t.* from CS_FZ_LCCZYPZB t where t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where sjswjg_dm = $value1$ and SWJGBZ = '1')
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_XZZXTZS T WHERE T.AJXXUUID = $uuid$ AND (1 = $tj2$ OR T.SSHJ_DM = $value2$) AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value3$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

select t.tzsuuid, t.sy, t.yj_1, t.byslly, t.sqsx, t.slswjg_dm, t.fyjgmc, t.slswjgmc, t.slr_dm, t.wszzrq, t.slrq, t.blqx, t.sqrq, t.slbz, t.swryxm, t.fyjgmc, t.fyjg_dm, t.wszg, t.lcswsx_dm, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.bznr from fz_swsxtzs t, gy_ws_wszb a where t.slbz = 'B' and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.ywzjuuid = $uuid$ and t.tzsuuid = a.ywwsuuid and a.wszzgz_dm like '%2'

SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SPXX T WHERE T.YWZJUUID = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_SWXZYSAJSCBG T WHERE T.LCSLID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = $zfbz$

select dj.nsrsbh, dj.djxh, dj.nsrmc, sj.swjgjg || sj.zg || '〔' || sj.nh || '〕' || sj.wh || '号' as sjtgjdswszg, sj.tgsjfprq, sj.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid, sj.sswfxwdjuuid, fp.sjfhfpuuid, sj.sjly_dm, sj.lrswjg_dm, sj.gsnsrglm from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb sj, fz_sjfhfp fp, fz_sswfxwdj dj where sj.sswfxwdjuuid = dj.sswfxwdjuuid and sj.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid = fp.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid(+) and sj.zstybz = ? and (sj.zfbz_1 = ? or sj.zfbz_1 is null) and sj.tgsjfpjcbz = ? and sj.swjg_dm = ? and sj.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(sj.lcbjbz, 'N') = ? union select nsrxx.nsrsbh, nsrxx.djxh, nsrxx.nsrmc, sj.swjgjg || sj.zg || '〔' || sj.nh || '〕' || sj.wh || '号' as sjtgjdswszg, sj.tgsjfprq, sj.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid, sj.sswfxwdjuuid, fp.sjfhfpuuid, sj.sjly_dm, sj.lrswjg_dm, sj.gsnsrglm from fz_sjtzfsfpxxb sj, fz_sjfhfp fp, dj_nsrxx nsrxx where sj.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid = fp.sjtzfsfpxxbuuid(+) and sj.djxh = nsrxx.djxh(+) and sj.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and sj.zstybz = ? and (sj.zfbz_1 = ? or sj.zfbz_1 is null) and sj.tgsjfpjcbz = ? and nvl(sj.lcbjbz, 'N') = ? and (nsrxx.zgswj_dm in (#macroparam#) or nsrxx.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) or sj.lrswjg_dm in (#macroparam#))
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SWCLJDQKB T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?
select ajxxuuid,djxh,cgxxuuid,lcslid from fz_cgxxb where djxh = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'

SELECT t.wfxwbh, t.djxh, t.wfss, t.ssqjq_1, t.ssqjz_1, z.xgswjg_dm as djjg_dm, t.djrq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid, t.hdslid, t.rgdjbz, t.jcajbz, t.wfxwmc, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.zfbz_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.sjslid, t.sswfxwdjuuid, t.djr_dm, t.sswfxwclzt_dm, t.zjlx_dm_1, t.zjshry_dm, t.zjshrq, t.fzczjyy, t.ajly, t.sswflx_dm, t.sfsbfwf, t.sjtb_sj, t.sswfsd_dm, t.sswfxwdjuuidbf, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ssgly_dm, t.nsxyzb_dm FROM fz_sswfxwdj t, fz_zlxqgzxxb z, zh_sdxx s where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $value1$ and t.sswfsd_dm = $value2$ and t.lcslid is not null and t.rgdjbz = $value3$ and nvl(t.jcajbz, 'N') = $value4$ and t.sswfxwclzt_dm != $value5$ and not exists (select 1 from fz_swxzcfjds_jy j where nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = $value6$ and j.sswfxwdjuuid = t.sswfxwdjuuid) and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = $value7$ and z.sswfxwdjuuid = t.sswfxwdjuuid and z.ywfl_dm = $value8$ and z.zlxqgzzt_dm = $value9$ and nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz$ and s.sdzt_dm = $value10$ and z.zlxqgzxxbuuid = s.sdwsuuid
UPDATE FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK T SET T.SWXZCFJDSUUID = '', T.XGRQ = SYSDATE WHERE T.SWXZCFQKBJCCFCFQKUUID = ?
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SWCLJDS T WHERE T.SWCLJDSUUID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select count(ajxxuuid) sl from (select j.jcajxxuuid ajxxuuid from jc_ajxx j where nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.ajjczt_dm not in ('500', '501', '502', '503') and j.djxh = ? union select t.sswfxwdjuuid ajxxuuid from fz_sswfxwdj t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.sswfxwclzt_dm != '38' AND t.djxh = ?)

SELECT A.CBSKHFKBGUUID, B.* FROM FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF A, FZ_SWXZCFQKB_JCCF_CFQK B WHERE A.SWXZCFQKBJCCFUUID = B.SWXZCFQKBJCCFUUID AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND A.JCAJXXUUID = ?
SELECT T.* FROM FZ_BYSWXZCFJDS T WHERE T.DJXH = $djxh$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

select d.wfxwbh, d.sswfxwdjuuid, d.djjg_dm, d.djxh from fz_sswfxwdj d where d.djjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and d.wfxwbh = ? and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.* from FZ_SWXZBCXXB t where t.lcslid = $lcslid$ and t.sjslid = $uuid$ order by t.lrrq asc
select t.* from fz_zdswajsmslyjb t where (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = ?) and t.clwbbz = ? and t.jcajxxuuid = ?

select b.* from (select z.zlxqjnsfkuuid jdsuuid, s.dzbzdszl_dm, z.swjg_dm, z.swjgjg, z.zg, z.nh, z.wh, z.wszzrq, s.wssdsj, d.sswfxwdjuuid ajxxuuid, d.wfxwbh ajbh, d.wfxwmc ajmc, d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.ssqjq_1 skssqq, d.ssqjz_1 skssqz, 'FZ' ajbz from zh_sdxx s, fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_zlxqjnsfk z where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdzt_dm = '03' and s.sdwsuuid = z.zlxqjnsfkuuid and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.jcajbz, 'N') = 'N' and d.sswfxwdjuuid = z.sswfxwdjuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or d.djxh = ?) and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.xqjnskqx < sysdate and z.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) union select j.swxzcfjdsuuid jdsuuid, s.dzbzdszl_dm, j.swjg_dm, j.swjgjg, j.zg, j.nh, j.wh, j.wszzrq, s.wssdsj, d.sswfxwdjuuid ajxxuuid, d.wfxwbh ajbh, d.wfxwmc ajmc, d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.ssqjq_1 skssqq, d.ssqjz_1 skssqz, 'FZ' ajbz from zh_sdxx s, fz_sswfxwdj d, fz_swxzcfjds j where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdzt_dm = '03' and s.sdwsuuid = j.swxzcfjdsuuid and nvl(d.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(d.jcajbz, 'N') = 'N' and d.sswfxwdjuuid = j.sswfxwdjuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or d.djxh = ?) and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.jkqx < sysdate and j.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) union select z.zlxqjnsfkuuid jdsuuid, s.dzbzdszl_dm, z.swjg_dm, z.swjgjg, z.zg, z.nh, z.wh, z.wszzrq, s.wssdsj, a.jcajxxuuid ajxxuuid, a.jcajbh ajbh, a.ajmc ajmc, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.jcssqjq skssqq, a.jcssqjz skssqz, 'JC' ajbz from zh_sdxx s, jc_ajxx a, fz_zlxqjnsfk z where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdzt_dm = '03' and s.sdwsuuid = z.zlxqjnsfkuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.jcajxxuuid = z.sswfxwdjuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and nvl(z.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and z.xqjnskqx < sysdate and z.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) union select j.swxzcfjdsuuid jdsuuid, s.dzbzdszl_dm, j.swjg_dm, j.swjgjg, j.zg, j.nh, j.wh, j.wszzrq, s.wssdsj, a.jcajxxuuid ajxxuuid, a.jcajbh ajbh, a.ajmc ajmc, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.jcssqjq skssqq, a.jcssqjz skssqz, 'JC' ajbz from zh_sdxx s, jc_ajxx a, fz_swxzcfjds j where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdzt_dm = '03' and s.sdwsuuid = j.swxzcfjdsuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.jcajxxuuid = j.sswfxwdjuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and j.jkqx < sysdate and j.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) union select j.swcljdsuuid jdsuuid, s.dzbzdszl_dm, j.swjg_dm, j.swjgjg, j.zg, j.nh, j.wh, j.wszzrq, s.wssdsj, a.jcajxxuuid ajxxuuid, a.jcajbh ajbh, a.ajmc ajmc, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.jcssqjq skssqq, a.jcssqjz skssqz, 'JC' ajbz from zh_sdxx s, jc_ajxx a, jc_swcljds j where nvl(s.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and s.sdzt_dm = '03' and s.sdwsuuid = j.swcljdsuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and a.jcajxxuuid = j.jcajxxuuid and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (s.wssdsj + j.xjts) < sysdate and j.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) b where not EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM fz_cgxxb c WHERE b.jdsuuid = c.jdsuuid AND nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N')
